001package org.jfree.chart.axis;
002
003
004import java.awt.Stroke;
005import java.awt.Paint;
006import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008
009public class CyclicNumberAxisProduct implements Serializable, Cloneable {
010        private transient Stroke advanceLineStroke = CyclicNumberAxis.DEFAULT_ADVANCE_LINE_STROKE;
011        private transient Paint advanceLinePaint;
012
013        public Stroke getAdvanceLineStroke() {
014                return advanceLineStroke;
015        }
016
017        public void setAdvanceLineStroke2(Stroke advanceLineStroke) {
018                this.advanceLineStroke = advanceLineStroke;
019        }
020
021        public Paint getAdvanceLinePaint() {
022                return advanceLinePaint;
023        }
024
025        public void setAdvanceLinePaint2(Paint advanceLinePaint) {
026                this.advanceLinePaint = advanceLinePaint;
027        }
028
029        /**
030        * The advance line is the line drawn at the limit of the current cycle, when erasing the previous cycle.
031        * @param paint   the paint ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
032        */
033        public void setAdvanceLinePaint(Paint paint) {
034                Args.nullNotPermitted(paint, "paint");
035                this.advanceLinePaint = paint;
036        }
037
038        /**
039        * The advance line is the line drawn at the limit of the current cycle, when erasing the previous cycle.
040        * @param stroke   the stroke ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
041        */
042        public void setAdvanceLineStroke(Stroke stroke) {
043                Args.nullNotPermitted(stroke, "stroke");
044                this.advanceLineStroke = stroke;
045        }
046
047        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
048                return (CyclicNumberAxisProduct) super.clone();
049        }
050}
